definition: military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Kungfu martial artists learn the jump inside crescent kick in three different parts.
sentences.chinese: 學習功夫武術家內新月形踢三個不同的部分跳。

sentences.english: Later he left Simin Martial Arts Institution and was invited to Shenshahai Sports School as a teacher.
sentences.chinese: 後從四民武術研究社被邀請到什剎海體校任教。

sentences.english: The inheritor is the key of traditional Wushu heritage, and to protect the inheritor is an important means to protect traditional Wushu.
sentences.chinese: 傳承人是傳統武術傳承過程中的關鍵環節。

sentences.english: If I can fruit fly, I 'sword Hill song I used to fly EGA to understand martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 如果我能果蠅，我的歌，我用劍山飛特惠瞭解武術。

sentences.english: In fact, they're three times more likely to get injured than someone in martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，他們比武術練習者受傷的可能性高三倍。

sentences.english: The world image turns to cause peoples mistakes of Wushu.
sentences.chinese: 世界圖像化導致了人們對武術的誤讀。

sentences.english: Nunchaku is perhaps one of the most well recognized weapons in2)martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 雙節棍可能是武術中最爲人所熟知的武器。

sentences.english: Learn to defend against the double shirt grab from a professional Tai Chi instructor in this free martial arts video.
sentences.chinese: 學習對從專業邰持雙恤搶防守教練在此免費視頻武術。

sentences.english: B: In recent years, Wushu schools have developed quickly.
sentences.chinese: 近年來武術學校發展迅速。

sentences.english: Every level of the Xingyiquan practice is available annually, while participants can take part into some martial arts contest.
sentences.chinese: 每年可以申報段位，可以參加一些武術比賽。

sentences.english: The results showed that, at present, 25 sorts of Quan are more popular in Shaanxi.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，目前，陝西省較流行的武術拳種有25種。

sentences.english: Chinese martial arts is always a very interesting topic for foreign friends.
sentences.chinese: 中國武術一直都是外國朋友非常感興趣的話題。

sentences.english: Chinese traditional Wushu is the foundation of modern Wushu development.
sentences.chinese: 中國傳統武術是現代武術的搖籃和發展的基礎。

sentences.english: Chinese traditional Wushu is the foundation of modern Wushu development.
sentences.chinese: 中國傳統武術是現代武術的搖籃和發展的基礎。

sentences.english: There are different sorts of strength of Sanda .
sentences.chinese: 武術散打力量有不同的分類。

sentences.english: You've learnt some forms of martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 你學過某些形式的武術。
